project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, specifically calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement functionality to read CSV files and load data
Implement functionality to calculate the mean of numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate the median of numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate the mode of numerical columns
Write tests for the CSV reading function and all calculation functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
